delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdinaryTruck, RefrigeratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for the two truck types.
    Author:
    Daniel Field, Allen Basic
